data.description: I'm developer based in Clermont-Ferrand, and I'm very passionate and dedicated to my work.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: My introduction
about.description-part-2: I'm currently a third-year student at the IUT des Cézeaux.
about.description-part-3: My goal is to continue my studies in engineering schools in order to deepen my skills as a developer and acquire new knowledge in the IT field.

descriptions.description1:
Algoboto is a cross-platform mobile application developed by a group of four students at the IUT Clermont-Auvergne, using .NET MAUI technology.
 This innovative school project is aimed at children and aims to teach them programming in a fun and interactive way. The application allows programming a Lego robot by embedding blocks and moving instructions in a way similar to Scratch.
 Children can thus create command sequences to animate the robot and perform various tasks. To develop Algoboto, we adopted an agile methodology, organizing ourselves in sprints according to the Scrum framework.
 This approach allowed us to work collaboratively and iteratively, continuously improving the product through feedback and suggestions from each team member. Demonstrations were then conducted in an elementary school to gather feedback and improvement points.
descriptions.description2:
During our training in BUT Informatique, we developed a mobile application in React Native.
 This application allows users to view Star Wars characters, search for characters via a search bar, and view detailed descriptions of each character.
 It also offers the ability to save characters in a favorites list for later viewing. Additionally, our application offers a dark or light mode, as well as a choice of languages between French and English.
 For more information on the features of our application, you can consult the detailed description in the dedicated section.
descriptions.description3:
Our project is a game heavily inspired by Pong, one of the first popular video games, created in 1972 by Atari.
 The game is a table tennis simulation where two players each control a vertical bar with a controller, with the goal of returning a ball to the other side of the screen.
 The player who scores the ball earns a point.
 The game continues until one of the players reaches a certain number of points.
 To make this iconic game fit the tastes of our time, we added modern and innovative features to our game LeapHit.
 To not forget the nostalgia of the original game, LeapHit will adopt a dynamic retro style, with a palette of bright colors and neon accents.
 Players can also choose the device they want to use, such as the camera, Leap Motion, or the mouse.
descriptions.description4:
iOS mobile application developed in Swift. This application offers a traditional Chinese game called Dou Shou Qi, whose origins date back to the 5th century.
 The user can play against another user or against artificial intelligence. He also has the possibility to play in augmented reality, either against another user or against AI.
 Other interesting features are to be discovered, such as dark mode, language change, and many more. This project allowed me to discover the key points of Swift and acquire solid basic knowledge in this language.

section-1.title: Sandwich Course
section-1.description: Développement d’une application web permettant de conseiller nos clients sur la gestion du patrimoine. Les technologies utilisées sont les suivantes: Angular (Front), Symfony (API), MariaDB (BDD), docker.

section-2.title: Intership
section-2.description: Développement et implémentation de modèles de Plan de Gestion de Données dans un Système d’Information (Apache-PHP-Mysql).

section-3.title: IT assistant
section-3.description-1: Verification performed on client files using various Excel spreadsheets, with some programming to automate tasks (Python).
section-3.description-2: Creation of a web application to gather information about clients, developed in Nextjs.

testimonial-1.description: Noan is an extremely disciplined person when needed, and I truly admire this quality in him. I envy his ability to take his computer and work anywhere, even if it's just for a short period. Throughout our studies, although we never worked together on a project, witnessing how he approached his student responsibilities motivated and inspired me to work harder. His determination and work ethic are truly exemplary.

testimonial-2.description: Noan is a hardworking and serious person. We have collaborated on numerous projects, and I have always been impressed by his ability to adapt. He often takes on tasks that other team members do not want to do, demonstrating his commitment and team spirit.

testimonial-3.description: Noan worked at my company and significantly improved and simplified several repetitive tasks through the creation of automated scripts. His work not only increased our efficiency but also freed up time for more strategic tasks. I am extremely satisfied with his contribution and dedication.
